SELECT
FROM
WHERE 1 = 1 and is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY file_name

select

select b.*, a.`name` as project_name, a.`project_no` as project_no from project a inner join system_attachment b where 1=1 and a.is_deleted=0 and b.is_deleted=0 and a.project_id =b.resource_id
ORDER BY b.last_updated_date_time desc
